page.title: 08A Day In The Life Of Ryan
page.content: I wake up at about 6.30am. I get up and get dressed. I go downstairs and make breakfast. I take a cup of tea up for my Mum at 7.30. At 8.00 I clean my teeth and at 8.20 I set out for school. I park my bike at school and then I play football until 9.00 and we go in for Assembly. Assembly finishes at about 9.35 and then we are told about our work. I do Maths until 10.30 and then we have playtime and I play football. After play I carry on with Maths until 11.30 and then I do some English until 12.00. Dinnertime lasts for 1 hour and we play football and then come in for lessons. I play football in the next break and then have Rounders if it is nice and then it is time o go home. At home we have tea and then watch T.V. till 9.30. I read in bed and then I go to sleep.
